episodes.title: FBI Most Wanted: The 'Son of God' Who Controlled Presidents | Apollo Quiboloy True Crime
episodes.description:
THE PROPHET WHO FOOLED MILLIONS 
Apollo Quiboloy is nastier than Diddy, a dangerous cult leader, the Jeffrey Epstein of Phillipines. True Crime Expose. Crimes Anatomy Documentary.

Apollo Quiboloy claimed he was literally Jesus Christ reborn. Millions believed him. He built a billion-dollar empire, controlled presidents, and operated his own private army. Then the FBI and PH Govt put a bounty on his head - the same amount they offer for international terrorists.

This is the shocking true crime case of the "Appointed Son of God" who the FBI says was running one of the most sophisticated trafficking operations in modern history. From controlling earthquakes to controlling presidents, Apollo Quiboloy's empire of manipulation will blow your mind.

This isn't just another cult leader case - this is about how religious manipulation, political corruption, and international trafficking created one of the most powerful and dangerous men in the Philippines.

Watch these topics:
The Million Dollar Prophet
The Prophecy That Proved His Power
From Visions to Empire
The President's Best Friend
Behind the Walls: The Dark Reality
The FBI Takes Notice
The 3,000-Officer Manhunt
Running for Senate from Jail
Where He Stands Today

Apollo Quiboloy | FBI Most Wanted | Philippines Cult Leader | Religious Scandal | Trafficking Case | Duterte Connection | Son of God | True Crime Documentary | $5 Million Bounty | Kingdom of Jesus Christ | KOJC | Religious Tricks | International Manhunt | Philippines Politics | Cult Documentary

This video features a mix of scenes, including a large worship event at gateway church and dramatic moments from a TV show. There's also a segment on government accountability with mentions of the philippines news. Plus, an emotional moment involving an award or certificate is highlighted.
